artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Two orange warp. Yellow, tan & metallic bronze weft.  Twill. 
Machine edged on two sides. Larsen descriptive label stapled to face. (orange, yellow, tan, bronze metallic)
title: Pomegranate
